name: Void Volley
description:
Hello! We're Husky Game Development Enterprise over at Michigan Technological University. At the enterprise, we have students create games throughout their semesters with us. Check out all of our students' games!

Controls:

Player 1
  • WASD/Space - Movement
  • F - Fire Weapon
  • Q/E - Cycle Weapons
Player 2
  • IKJL/Space - Movement
  • N - Fire Weapon
  • U - Cycle Weapons

Credits:

  • Max Jorgensen - Programmer
  • Isaac Elenbaas - Programmer
  • Austin Keene - Programmer
  • Kolby Swanson - Programmer
  • Michael Symonds - Programmer
  • Tyberius Livingston - Sound Designer
